name: sentinel-parental-control
description: Full-stack parental control system with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy:fullstack: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start:server" "cd web && npm run preview"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
